amendment.description: To extend through December 31, 2012, the increased expensing for small businesses.

action.text: Motion to table amendment SA 209 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 49 - 48. Record Vote Number: 37.
Amendment SA 209 proposed by Senator Sessions for Senator Kyl to Amendment SA 100. (consideration: CR S1226-1227) To extend through December 31, 2012, the increased expensing for small businesses.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 209 proposed by Senator Sessions for Senator Kyl to Amendment SA 100.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Motion to table amendment SA 209 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 49 - 48. Record Vote Number: 37.
